description: Try these gluten-free raspberry muffins with cacao nibs swirled throughout. Make a batch to freeze so you have them on hand whenever morning tea calls.
keywords: Sweet muffin,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Raspberry,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Gluten Free Raspberry Choc Chip Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius. Grease muffin tray with butter and set aside.
In a large mixing bowl add the almond meal, tapioca starch, coconut flour and baking powder. Whisk to combine.

In a separate mixing bowl add the coconut oil, eggs and Baker’s Bliss. Beat with electric hand beaters until eggs begin to pale and Baker’s Bliss is dissolved. Add the apple cider vinegar, vanilla extract and yoghurt and beat to combine.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and fold through until just combined. Once just combined add the raspberries and cocao nibs and fold through.
Equally divide mixture between the 12 muffin moulds in muffin tray. Place muffin tray into the oven and bake for 32 minutes.
Once baked, remove from the oven and allow to cool in the tin for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
